programme.title: El Nuevo Narcotraficante
programme.desc: Octavio Beltrán rose out of poverty thanks to drug dealing. Obsessed with being the best, he defies his former boss, El Sultan, and takes over the complete business. But his new worst enemy is ready to fight back and use every tool possible to get back to the top of the criminal underworld.

programme.title: They Call Her Headhunter
programme.desc: The wife of a nefarious TV Evangelist hires a savage bounty hunter known as the Headhunter to kidnap her husband and inflict terrible pain before killing him off. But things are not all what they seem in the world of ‘saving lives’ as the Headhunter discovers a very dark and wicked secret inside this cult.

programme.title: Sex Game
programme.desc: Rachel and Ryan are two popular influencers who will do anything to get a few more likes and win the next virtual challenge.

programme.title: Rust 2
programme.desc: After the horrific ordeal and the loss of her friends, Heather is forced to return to Hotel Fear where Travis prepares for his next victims, Heather must fight once again.

programme.title: Prediccion Fatal
programme.desc: A tarot reading seems to point to Manuel as the one who caused the death of Acrisio, an unscrupulous politician who is the father of Danna, this young man's girlfriend. Now Manuel must run to save his life and free Danna.

programme.title: En Mis Propias Manos
programme.desc: The wife of a police officer is molested, beaten and mentally and physically abused. Other police officers suspect that something is happening, but the woman is afraid to speak up and accuse her abuser.

programme.title: Madres Michoacanas
programme.desc: When criminals take Michoacan, the women of the town fear for their children, who could be drafted by the new mafia.

programme.title: Los Primos Rivales
programme.desc: A cop faces off with his own cousin, a drug dealer, in a battle where both has everything to lose.

programme.title: Beast: A Monster Among Men
programme.desc: Five friends head out on a getaway to a secluded cabin just outside of the Six Rivers National Forest. An argument forces the group apart and things begin to deteriorate quickly. As the night progresses, tensions build, and things are clearly not what they seem.The question each man must now ask themselves is how well do they know each other and how well do they really know themselves.

programme.title: 2: Voodoo Academy
programme.desc: Young hot travelers are sidelined by a road blocked with fallen trees, and stop for a night at the mansion belonging to sexy Sebastian. The house has a history of voodoo, mayhem and horror, and new arrivals are fresh meat for the hungry house.

programme.title: La Corte Malandra
programme.desc: Jose Thomas tells his story, when he was a gangster who defended his hood, helped his neighbours, and talked kids out of being like him. Jose Thomas is a spirit, is one of the entities that became part of La Corte Malandra cult.

programme.title: La Hummer Y El Camaro
programme.desc: Two orphan brothers, Pedro and Pablo, meet again after Pedro left Pablo in Mexico to find a new job and better opportunities in the US, but Pablo has a surprise for his brother.

programme.title: Las Caras Del Diablo 2
programme.desc: When a complex investigation implicates an ex Justice Minister and his family, detective Guzman has not other choice than free from prison his partner, inspector Pedro Ramirez, to crack the case. Now, Ramirez is back with a new mission that will become a personal challenge to him.

programme.title: El 24
programme.desc: A hitman called Chema and known as El Tumbador, receives the order to kill a man called Manuel who got involved with a Drug Lord mistress.

programme.title: El Bazukazo 2
programme.desc: After being left for dead, Edgar is rescued by a beautiful woman who works in the mafia. When Edgar recovers from his injuries, he joins the new team as an expert in handling weapons is needed.
